headline: Why Micron (MU) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of memory chips maker Micron (NYSE:MU) jumped 4.7% in the afternoon session after the stock extended its positive momentum as a Citi analyst raised the company's price target, citing strong demand for its memory chips driven by the artificial intelligence boom.
